q: What is the primary purpose of an Index in a database?
o: To improve the speed of data retrieval operations
Examining every row in a table to find results (slow without index)

q: Does adding an index increase write time?
o: Yes, because the index must also be updated on every write
An index on a field other than the primary key
An index on multiple fields (e.g., Last Name + First Name)
